title: Catch 'em being good (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ron Friedman, Marlene Schneider and Synergetic Productions
brief_description: Instructional film for teachers demonstrating various approaches to motivating and disciplining students in the classroom. Shows methods for teachers to get the best out of their students, particularly the more difficult ones.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Friedman, Marlene Schneider and Synergetic Productions
